seeds.title: The Broken Crown
seeds.description: A kingdom in turmoil after the monarch's mysterious disappearance.
seeds.opening: You stand at the cracked threshold of the crown hall. Torches gutter in the cold wind; the throne sits empty.

seeds.title: Signal from Ganymede
seeds.description: A lonely research outpost on Ganymede receives a strange transmission.
seeds.opening: Snow glitters like broken glass under the station's dome. The console lights blink a code you don't recognize.

seeds.title: Smoke Over Rue Lune
seeds.description: A foggy city hides secrets and a vanished jazz singer.
seeds.opening: Rain slaps the pavement as neon smears the street. You have one cigarette left and an address scrawled on a napkin.
